text: Gavur Elli (, ) or Ghandoura () is a small town in northern Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. Administrative center of Nahiya Ghandoura in Jarabulus District, the town has a population of 1,658 as per the 2004 census. It is located midway between Çobanbey (al-Rai) and Jarabulus, at the northern banks of Sajur River, some south east of the Sajur Dam. Ghandoura is the administrative center of Nahiya Ghandoura of the Jarabulus District. ==Syrian Civil War== On 28 July 2016, US airstrikes killed at least 28 civilians, mostly women and including seven children in Ghandoura. ==References== Category:Turkmen communities in Syria
title: Ghandoura
